tweet:
Americans with pre-existing conditions must be protected!

Today, I attended my first @WaysMeansCmte hearing on "Protecting Americans with Pre-Existing Conditions." pic.twitter.com/a0rZO71lDP

Today, the House Ways and Means Committee will hold a hearing to examine how we can protect Americans with pre-existing conditions and their access to affordable healthcare. pic.twitter.com/AuDpKgp95b

I want to hear from you!

I am going to be hosting a live Telephone Town Hall this evening from 7:30-8:30pm. Join me to talk about some the critical issues that are important to you.

Dial (877) 229-8493, and when prompted, enter passcode 117061 pic.twitter.com/G9SpqDx2kq

I just had my first organizational meeting of @WaysMeansCmte.  I look forward to using my position on this committee to address important issues such as reinstating SALT, improving Americans’ retirement, lowering health care costs, and modernizing our nation’s infrastructure. pic.twitter.com/FPVJN669ZY

The DoD has cfd that climate change is real!
This report on climate change & its consequential impact on our military installations here & around the world was reqd by the #NDAAct which I supported while on the House Armed Services Committee. http://politi.co/2HjnwXJ

This morning, on @NPR's @MorningEdition  I discussed the importance of reopening the government, and coming together to find common ground; it's what governing is all about. Give it a listen. https://www.npr.org/2019/01/17/686135349/we-need-to-work-together-to-reopen-government-rep-suozzi-says?utm_medium=RSS&utm_campaign=storiesfromnpr&fbclid=IwAR1IxJTC5G2yyUJe0dogcij-1OD3hl-Xae1AzmtNC-Xq1NU5mVpnhBo7q6E …
It was nice to meet with members of @AJCGlobal during their annual National Leadership Council Advocacy Fly-In. Thanks for stopping by! pic.twitter.com/bhvXNdSjWX

I was on NY1’s “Inside City Hall” last night. Watch this short video. https://www.ny1.com/nyc/all-boroughs/inside-city-hall/2019/01/15/shutdown-day-24--congress-back-in-session--but-what-happens-next-?fbclid=IwAR1T7uxwwn1Rf5Xh2CUc1bPIxtkwG5wA3l1RiSdzeL9R3NCJMGxHZko3vfQ …

After Julius Schwarz passed away, his family realized they knew little of his WWII svc. They reached out to our ofc & our vets caseworker did some investigating. Today I was honored to present his daughter w/his Purple Heart & Bronze Star. Thank you for your service, Pvt. Schwarz pic.twitter.com/pvHx0KJNOB

Semper Paratus/Always Prepared! Despite not getting paid during the govt shutdown, 42,000 active duty members of the USCG remain always prepared!
I stopped by @USCG Station EatonsNeck w/pastries&coffee to thank the crew for their hard work standing the watch during the shutdown. pic.twitter.com/FKmDrg4ymq

Let's end the shutdown!
This morning @RepKathleenRice & I met w/ air traffic controllers outside New York TRACON in Westbury, the busiest TRACON in the country. pic.twitter.com/Q1sjfjVEw9
https://suozzi.house.gov/media/press-releases/suozzi-named-prestigious-us-house-ways-means-committee …

Ways and Means!!!

It is a great honor to serve as your Member of Congress. I have just been appointed to the Ways and Means Committee! Established in 1789, it is the oldest committee in the House of Representatives. pic.twitter.com/XzELXd2wUv
Today was the inaugural Problem Solvers Caucus meeting for the 116th Congress - 24 Democrats and 24 Republicans working together to get things done for our country. pic.twitter.com/v2UEC42Fhj

I am both proud & thankful for my Jesuit education; @BostonCollege '84 & @FordhamLawNYC '89
One of the core values of a Jesuit education is "Women and Men for and with Others." When all are working for and with others, all are equal. http://bit.ly/2RFM8hf

I am a proud cosponsor of #HR8, important common sense, gun violence prevention legislation that would require federal background checks on all gun sales, incl private transactions, w/exception for transfers betw family members & temporary use of a gun for hunting purposes. pic.twitter.com/SUy4lQx8ht

The NY Congressional Delegation met with @NYGovCuomo today. His top 3 priorities: SALT, SALT, SALT. The"King-Suozzi Bill," with @RepPeteKing would reinstate the full income tax deduction for state and local taxes (SALT). https://nwsdy.li/2TCkzmm

Today, @RepPeteKing joined me to announce our bipartisan legislation, the “King-Suozzi Bill," that would reinstate the full income tax deduction for state and local taxes (SALT).
 https://suozzi.house.gov/media/press-releases/congressmen-suozzi-and-king-announce-legislation-reinstate-salt-deduction-and … pic.twitter.com/9TL0JL0axr

Tonight I attended Senator Jim Gaughran's swearing-in ceremony in Northport. Jim was first elected to the Huntington Town Council 35 years ago. It was a long journey to this victory. He gave a great speech tonight. Congratulations Jim! @Gaughran4Senate pic.twitter.com/0eSexyKhs9
I spoke in North Hempstead at the swearing-in of Senator @AnnaMKaplan - Anna is the first Persian American to be elected to the NYS Senate. Congratulations Anna! pic.twitter.com/ojgTYMXFCS
I spoke in Queens at Senator @LiuNewYork 's swearing-in. John is the first Asian American in the NYS Senate. Congratulations John! pic.twitter.com/s0A074SDHq
Congratulations to Huntington Town Councilwoman @joancergol - Last night I stopped by at her swearing in ceremony in downtown Huntington. pic.twitter.com/Q5S50D60ZV

Congratulations and best wishes to newly sworn-in Senator @KevinThomasNY - the first Indian-American to serve in the New York State Senate. I attended his swearing in yesterday. pic.twitter.com/TJDGapNYBv

Government is broken. Gerrymandering. Too much money. Voter suppression.
Today, I joined my colleagues to introduce H.R. 1 - the “For the People” Act.
 https://bit.ly/2R6eTUV  pic.twitter.com/hggJYCTb1p

Happy 100th Birthday to former Congressman @RepWolff !
 https://suozzi.house.gov/media/press-releases/suozzi-wishes-rep-lester-wolff-oldest-living-former-member-congress-happy-100th … pic.twitter.com/2NjxZeFd6S
A few more pics from a special day! Congratulations to Leader Pelosi! pic.twitter.com/hb67jAV9ba
What a day! The only thing more gratifying than being sworn in as a Member of the 116th Congress was having my family alongside me. I am truly blessed. pic.twitter.com/Lx3F7V6GmI

The Northport VA should be a model for our country; I will continue to push for improvements incl reopening of Beacon House, improving physical plant w/demo of vacant bldgs, improving access to mental health counseling & transition from active duty status http://nwsdy.li/2R4Zoww
